title: Successful user login with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can login successfully using valid email and password and receives a secure JWT token.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter a valid registered email address and correct password.
Click the login button.
Ensure the user is authenticated, redirected to the appropriate dashboard, and a JWT token is securely issued.

title: Failed login with incorrect credentials
description: Verify that login fails when using invalid email or password and a meaningful error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter an invalid email or incorrect password.
Click the login button.
Verify that login fails and a clear error notification is displayed to the user.

title: Role-based access control enforcement
description: Verify that administrators have full access and standard users have read-only access to their profile only.

steps.description: Login as administrator.
Confirm full CRUD operations are accessible for employees, designations, and departments.
Logout and login as a standard user.
Confirm access is restricted to read-only profile view, with no access to management features.

title: Create new employee with valid details
description: Verify that an administrator can create a new employee with all valid details including unique email and valid phone number and pincode.

steps.description: Login as administrator and navigate to the employee creation form.
Fill in employee details with unique email, valid phone number, designation, department, and valid pincode.
Submit the form.
Verify the employee is successfully added to the list with correct details displayed.

title: Employee email validation for uniqueness
description: Verify that creating or editing an employee with an already existing email results in a validation error.

steps.description: Attempt to create a new employee using an email already existing in the system.
Check that a validation message prevents submission and informs about duplicate email.
Edit an existing employee and change the email to another existing employeeâ€™s email.
Verify the form shows a uniqueness validation error preventing saving.

title: Validation of phone number and pincode formats on employee form
description: Ensure phone number and pincode input fields enforce correct format validation and prevent invalid data submission.

steps.description: Open employee creation or edit form.
Enter invalid phone number formats (e.g., letters, incomplete number).
Confirm validation error prevents form submission and displays appropriate messages.
Enter invalid pincodes (e.g., non-numeric, wrong length).
Confirm validation error is shown and form submission is blocked.

title: Employee deletion with confirmation prompt
description: Verify that deleting an employee prompts for confirmation and upon confirmation deletes the employee record.

steps.description: Navigate to employee list and select an employee to delete.
Click the delete button.
Verify a confirmation dialog appears requesting user confirmation.
Confirm the deletion.
Verify the employee record is removed from the list.
Attempt to delete again but cancel the confirmation.
Verify the employee record remains unchanged.

title: CRUD operations on designations
description: Verify that administrators can create, read, update, and delete designations successfully with validated input.

steps.description: Navigate to the designation management section.
Create a new designation with valid name.
Check that the new designation appears in the list.
Edit an existing designation and save changes.
Verify the updated designation name is reflected in the list.
Delete a designation and confirm the confirmation prompt.
Ensure the designation is removed from the list.

title: CRUD operations on departments
description: Verify that administrators can create, read, update, and delete departments successfully with validated input.

steps.description: Navigate to the department management section.
Create a new department with valid details.
Confirm the new department is displayed in the list.
Edit an existing department and save changes.
Verify updated department details appear correctly.
Delete a department and confirm removal on prompt.
Verify the department is removed from the list.

title: Dashboard overview displays employee data snapshot
description: Verify that the dashboard provides an accurate overview snapshot of employee data and loads within 2 seconds.

steps.description: Login as administrator and navigate to the dashboard.
Check the dashboard displays summarized employee metrics correctly.
Ensure the dashboard loads completely within 2 seconds on desktop and mobile.

title: Standard user profile view and update request functionality
description: Validate that standard users can view their profile and optionally request updates which are communicated correctly.

steps.description: Login as a standard user.
Navigate to the user profile view.
Confirm that user details are correctly displayed and no editing is allowed.
Submit an update request if option is available.
Verify the update request is submitted and confirmation feedback is given.

title: Secure logout terminates user session
description: Verify that logging out invalidates the JWT token and redirects user to login page with no access to authenticated routes afterwards.

steps.description: Login as any user.
Click the logout button.
Assert that the user is redirected to the login page and session token is invalidated.
Attempt to access a secured page without logging in again.
Verify access is denied and user is redirected back to login.

title: API token validation and protection
description: Ensure all API requests require valid JWT tokens and reject unauthorized requests with clear error responses.

steps.description: Make API requests to protected endpoints without a token.
Verify the server responds with unauthorized error.
Make API requests with an expired or invalid token.
Confirm the server rejects the request with appropriate authentication error.
Make API requests with a valid token.
Ensure the requests are processed successfully with expected data returned.

title: Responsive UI layout and performance on various devices
description: Validate that the UI components render properly and respond correctly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices with load times under 2 seconds.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop viewport.
Check UI is correctly laid out and load times are under 2 seconds.
Repeat above step on tablet and mobile device viewports.
Ensure UI adjusts responsively with no broken interactions and load times remain acceptable.

title: Password storage security compliance
description: Verify that user passwords are stored securely in the backend using bcrypt or Argon2 hashing algorithms.

steps.description: Create a test user with a known password.
Access the user password storage location in database or backend.
Confirm password is stored as a bcrypt or Argon2 hash and not in plain text.

title: Error handling notifications and modals
description: Verify that application shows clear and descriptive notifications or modals on errors such as failed form submissions, API errors, or permission denials.

steps.description: Trigger a form submission with invalid data (e.g., invalid phone number).
Ensure a clear validation error notification is displayed.
Simulate an API error response.
Verify the user is informed about the failure via notification or modal.
Attempt an unauthorized action as a standard user.
Confirm permission error feedback is shown to the user.
